resources.string: Server is down please contact your inventory manager for master password.
Some error occured please contact your inventory manager.
Network Not Avaliable please eanble your network through notification bar.
Due to Unavabiltty of network we are unable to authenticate you . In this case you can either use your master password (contact admin) or enable internet through notification bar .
Master password you entred is incorrect.
Device is to get unlocked in few seconds . You will be given window of 30 min to enable network and logout from Inventory app home screen. \n After 30 min device will automatically get locked.
